mapper.select: SELECT vvi.* FROM ven_vendor_info vvi INNER JOIN ven_relation_vendor_company vrvc ON vrvc.vendor_info_id = vvi.id AND vrvc.company_id = #{companyId} AND vrvc.enabled = 1 WHERE vvi.last_updated_date BETWEEN #{startDateTime} and #{endDateTime} ORDER BY vvi.last_updated_date DESC

SELECT avi.* FROM ven_vendor_info avi INNER JOIN ven_relation_vendor_company arvc ON arvc.vendor_info_id = avi.id AND arvc.company_id = #{companyId} AND arvc.enabled = 1 WHERE 1 = 1
AND avi.vendor_name like concat(concat('%',#{venNickname}),'%')
AND avi.vendor_code like concat(concat('%',#{vendorCode}),'%')
ORDER BY avi.vendor_code

SELECT avi.vendor_name ,aac.tenant_id FROM ven_vendor_info avi INNER JOIN artemis.art_company aac on avi.company_oid = aac.company_oid WHERE length(avi.vendor_name)>0 GROUP BY avi.vendor_name ,aac.tenant_id HAVING COUNT(1) > 1;
SELECT avi.* FROM ven_vendor_info avi WHERE avi.vendor_name = #{vendorName} AND avi.tenant_id = #{tenantId} AND avi.source = #{source}

SELECT vin.* FROM ven_vendor_info vin INNER JOIN artemis.art_company aaco on vin.company_oid= aaco.company_oid WHERE length(vin.vendor_id)> 0 AND vin.vendor_id NOT IN( SELECT vi.vendor_id FROM ven_vendor_info vi INNER JOIN artemis.art_company aac on vi.company_oid= aac.company_oid WHERE length(vi.vendor_id)> 0 and length(vi.vendor_name)> 0 GROUP BY vi.vendor_id, vi.vendor_name, aac.tenant_id HAVING COUNT(1)> 1) GROUP BY vin.vendor_id, aaco.tenant_id HAVING COUNT(1)> 1
SELECT avi.tenant_id FROM ven_vendor_info avi GROUP BY avi.tenant_id
SELECT avi.* FROM ven_vendor_info avi WHERE avi.tenant_id = #{tenantId}
SELECT avi.* FROM ven_vendor_info avi WHERE avi.tenant_id = #{tenantId} AND avi.vendor_code = #{vendorCode}
